Detailed Description

Provides colour space functions.

Convert hue, satuation and luminosity values to red, green and blue.

Parameters:
hue Hue.
satuation Satuation.
luminosity Value.
red Red value returned.
green Green value returned.
blue Blue value returned.
Returns:
int FREEIMAGE_ALGORITHMS_SUCCESS on success or FREEIMAGE_ALGORITHMS_ERROR on error.
